title: What is my IP?
description: Find out your current IP address and the corresponding reverse DNS. Ideal for network diagnostics, security and connection verification.
intro: IP (Internet Protocol) is a unique address assigned to each device connected to the internet.
ip_label: My IP address at the moment is:
ip_types: There are two main types of IP addresses:
ipv6: IPv6: longer, with letters and numbers (ex: 2001:0db8:85a3::8a2e:0370:7334)
